captions.text:
I just wish I could go back to the
beginning

Back to when things
were new and exciting.

Get to know someone and 
you let them under your skin.
and you feel like you're suffocating.

I didn't know it was bad 
or something.

I mean, that's what it looked like.
You guys had the best

pictures and statuses.
I was always jealous of that.

Kurt you did this,
this is you

Look at me with your eyes
and tell me I make you happy
Tell me you don't love me

comments.text:
I am a lesbian but  I prefer to watch films about gay men rather then  gay 
women, I think it´s partly my own choice and partly because the quality is 
lacking is so many lesbian films(not to say that all gay films are up to 
part. Blue is the warmest color, Fucling Amal, But I am a cheerleader and 
The kids are alright is the like the only lesbian films that can compete 
with  the same quality as Weekend, Milk, Free fall, Maurice, Beautiful 
things, undertow, Latter days and maybe 50 more that I´ve enjoyed. Plus 
everyone should watch Looking. It´s HBO at it´s best﻿
comments.author: stereosnuttan

comments.text:
+nathan jones
 Sorry about the late answer. Well thera are alot of them hmm let me 
think.  I hope foreign films are no problem for you because half of the 
probably are. Jitters, Shelter, A love to hide, get real, just a question 
of love, C.R.A.Z.Y.(way underated amazing french canadian film), Out in the 
dark, Maurice, Summer storm, latter days, Yossi and jagger, Yossi, Eyes 
wide open, Edge of severteen, plan b, were the world mine, strapped, you´ll 
get over it, the war boys, monster pies and so many many moore
